00030 /** Initializes the Lua binding of the main IM library.  \n
00031  * Returns 1 (leaves the "im" table on the top of the stack).
00032  * You must link the application with the "imlua51" library.
00033  * \ingroup imlua */
00034 int imlua_open(lua_State *L);
00035 int luaopen_imlua(lua_State *L);
00036 
00037 #ifdef __IM_IMAGE_H  /* must include im_image.h before this */
00038 /** Pushes an image as a metatable on the stack.
00039  * \ingroup imlua */
00040 void imlua_pushimage(lua_State *L, imImage* image);
00041 
00042 /** Gets an image as a metatable from the stack, checks for correct type.
00043  * \ingroup imlua */
00044 imImage* imlua_checkimage(lua_State *L, int param);
00045 #endif
00046 
00047 /** Initializes the Lua binding of the capture library.  \n
00048  * Returns 1 (leaves the "im" table on the top of the stack).
00049  * You must link the application with the "imlua_capture51" library.
00050  * \ingroup imlua */
00051 int imlua_open_capture(lua_State *L);
00052 int luaopen_imlua_capture(lua_State *L);
00053 
00054 /** Initializes the Lua binding of the process library.  \n
00055  * Returns 1 (leaves the "im" table on the top of the stack).
00056  * You must link the application with the "imlua_process51" library.
00057  * \ingroup imlua */
00058 int imlua_open_process(lua_State *L);
00059 int luaopen_imlua_process(lua_State *L);
00060 
00061 /** Initializes the Lua binding of the fourier transform library.  \n
00062  * Returns 1 (leaves the "im" table on the top of the stack).
00063  * You must link the application with the "imlua_fftw51" library.
00064  * \ingroup imlua */
00065 int imlua_open_fftw(lua_State *L);
